Dataset_Lectures_V1"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.text7","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text7","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"SELECT 
LectureName as LectureName,
L/Builder.Lecture_Course/Builder.Course/CourseName as CourseName,
L/Builder.Lecture_Course/Builder.Course/Builder.Course_School/Builder.School/SchoolType as SchoolType
FROM Builder.Lecture as L"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}},{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.text8","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text8 text-success","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Compiled SQL : "},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"SELECT 
 "L"."lecturename" AS "LectureName", 
 "al1Builder$Course"."coursename" AS "CourseName", 
 "al2Builder$School"."schooltype" AS "SchoolType" 
FROM 
 "builder$lecture" "L" 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN "builder$lecture_course" "atj1Builder$Lecture_Course" ON "atj1Builder$Lecture_Course"."builder$lectureid" = "L"."id" 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN "builder$course" "al1Builder$Course" ON "al1Builder$Course"."id" = "atj1Builder$Lecture_Course"."builder$courseid" 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN "builder$course_school" "atj2Builder$Course_School" ON "atj2Builder$Course_School"."builder$courseid" = "al1Builder$Course"."id" 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN "builder$school" "al2Builder$School" ON "al2Builder$School"."id" = "atj2Builder$Course_School"."builder$schoolid""},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}}],"ariaHidden":false}}]}},{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.groupBox2","widget":"GroupBox","props":{"id":{"$type":"DerivedUniqueIdProperty","widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.groupBox2"},"class":"mx-name-groupBox2","header":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"GetLecturesV2"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2","collapsible":"notInitially","content":[{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.container2","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container2","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.actionButton2$visibility","widget":"ConditionalVisibilityWrapper","props":{"visible":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"function","name":"_hasSomeRole","parameters":[{"type":"literal","value":"Administrator"},{"type":"literal","value":"User"}]},"args":{}}},"contents":[{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.actionButton2","widget":"ActionButton","props":{"buttonId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.actionButton2","class":"mx-name-actionButton2","renderType":"button","buttonClass":"btn-default","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"ACT text-primary","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"OQL Statement : Dataset_Lectures_V2 "},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"SELECT 
SchoolType as SchoolType,
CourseName as CourseName,
LectureName as LectureName
FROM Builder.School as S
LEFT JOIN S/Builder.Course_School/Builder.Course as C
LEFT JOIN C/Builder.Lecture_Course/Builder.Lecture as L
"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}},{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.text1","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text1 text-success","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Compiled SQL : "},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"SELECT 
 "S"."schooltype" AS "SchoolType", 
 "C"."coursename" AS "CourseName", 
 "L"."lecturename" AS "LectureName" 
FROM 
 "builder$school" "S" 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN "builder$course_school" "atj1Builder$Course_School" ON "atj1Builder$Course_School"."builder$schoolid" = "S"."id" 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN "builder$course" "C" ON "C"."id" = "atj1Builder$Course_School"."builder$courseid" 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN "builder$lecture_course" "atj2Builder$Lecture_Course" ON "atj2Builder$Lecture_Course"."builder$courseid" = "C"."id" 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN "builder$lecture" "L" ON "L"."id" = "atj2Builder$Lecture_Course"."builder$lectureid"
"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}}],"ariaHidden":false}}]}}]},{"name":"tabPage2","caption":{"$type":"TextProperty","value":"WHERE"},"isDelayed":true,"refreshOnShow":false,"content":[{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.actionButton3$visibility","widget":"ConditionalVisibilityWrapper","props":{"visible":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"function","name":"_hasSomeRole","parameters":[{"type":"literal","value":"Administrator"},{"type":"literal","value":"User"}]},"args":{}}},"contents":[{"$widgetId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.actionButton3","widget":"ActionButton","props":{"buttonId":"45.DataStore.OQL_Test_Web.actionButton3","class":"mx-name-actionButton3","renderType":"button","buttonClass":"btn-default","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"ACT Builder test Get by user"},"args":{}}},"tooltip":{"$type":"TextProperty","value":""},"action":{"$type":"ActionProperty","action":{"type":"callMicroflow","argMap":{},"config":{"operationId":"FzvS6bizNUav8FDFdbGBLQ","async":true,"progress":{"message":"","modal":true},"validate":"view","allowedRoles":["Administrator","User"]},"disabledDuringExecution":true},"abortOnServerValidation":true}}}]}}]}]}}]}}]}}]}}],"listenTargets":[]
